channel.description: Recent content in Mail Sender Plus on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: Priorities
item.description: Priorities By default, in Connector NAV/365 BC there are two levels that are important: User reports User setup Example: A filled in sender field in a user report overrides the per user setting.

item.title: User setup
item.description: Setup of an SMTP adress per user First of all, we need to access the intended user’s user setup to make sure that the correct email address is specified there. The user setup for the user Max Mustermann Check if the marked e-mail field is filled in (correctly). Make any necessary changes and then close the user setup. Now open the Mail Sender Plus setup, which can be found in the Connector NAV menu.

item.title: Report setup
item.description: Set up an SMTP address per report You also have the option to set a specific address per report. First, open the Mail Sender Plus setup again. There we will now store an address that will always be used in the invoice dispatch. The Mail Sender Plus setup, a new entry was created Now open the User Reports setup and open the settings for the intended report, in our case Invoices.

item.title: The Dialog
item.description: The Dialog Also in the dialog you have the possibility to adjust the sender address again, provided that the address to be used was previously stored in the Mail Sender Plus setup. Overview of the dialog Simply change the address in the “Email sender” field to the address you intended. Afterwards you can confirm the dialog as usual.
